welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Totteridge, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact facility, providing easy access to check-in, security, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, London City Airport offers a dedicated terminal with exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free for up to 4 hours, after which a fee applies.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
